author: Dayle Shepherd
comment: I wanted something like this for two reasons:  1. When i'm in the shower to stop the screen getting activated and registered the water as swipes.  2. When I'm in bed to stop the screen getting activated and killing battery!  This app helps out with both of the above :). I have it enabled to lock the screen after i swipe from the left to the centre of the screen twice. Then to unlock again upon entering a series of swipes. Perfect!
title: Great App!

author: Rich H
comment: It works well so deserves 5* rating, great for stopping watch doing things when it rains, but why on earth would anyone need to keep a watch on while getting a shower, do u not need to wash your wrist? Is the 3 second task of removing a watch to shower too much of a drain on your precious time? Lmao
title: Good app

author: Mickey Mousec
comment: This should be standard on wear watches as without it if I get the watch slightly wet be it from rain or sweat the bloody thing goes bananas.  I know it's probably a kernel issue and beyond the scope of the app, but an option to turn off wake by screen tap altogether and just use the button would be gravy.
title: Essential for sw3

author: Al Fordy
comment: Keeps causing the watch screen to lock and turn off which stops notifications coming through. Uninstalled and back to no issues
title: Broken

comment: Nice app for people that need it.  I found it unnecessary, but if things change I'll definitely reinstall it.  I found the initial set-up confusing, as the descriptions weren't totally clear to me.
title: Nice

author: George Hurst
comment: Not a consistent problem, but every once in awhile it will not re brighten  the screen when it comes out of lock mode. It's really an issue when in bright light the screen is so dim cannot even correct the problem.
title: Un repoduceable problem

author: marcus kenny
comment: This is perfect for solving issues like music on my phone starting because I crossed my arms and my arm pressed the unpause button on the screen
title: Accidental use fix

author: Andre Camenzind
comment: Nexus 4 and Sony SW3. Can set a swipe combination, app works perfectly. Refuses to set a pattern unlock. Weird
title: Can't set pattern unlock

author: François Simond
comment: And very good implementation as well! I don't need a locking mechanism for my Android Wear right now but will definitely install it again when needed.
title: Great concept

author: Mihnea Cinteza
comment: 2.2.1 fixed all my gripes, all is well in the world now
title: Great app, does exactly what it says on the tin

author: Chris Andersson
comment: I can't believe I need this app for this, a lockscreen should've come with the device out of the box!
title: Very good!

author: Christopher Thwing
comment: If used for the first time in airplane mode, it will pop over your screen that you must set a pattern using your phone. But in airplane mode, it cannot open the app on the phone. There is no way I could find to back out of the app and I had to force restart the watch.
title: Do not use in airplane mode

author: Luis P
comment: Sony SW3 and Galaxy S6 Plus Edge. Device feature does not lock watch on start-up, tested by using forced re-start on a locked SW, it rebooted unlocked. So if lost and somebody found it, they could easily factory reset it and keep it.

author: James da 4th
comment: Wow! This lets me have my watch easily accessible without fearing that I am accidentally pressing buttons. I love how customizable this app is, too!
title: Perfect !

author: Himmat Singh
comment: Just add an option like: Lock Screen on from [time] to [time]. For example, my lock screen will be on from 9 am to 3 pm...
title: Time option

author: Alexander Jansson
comment: Now I can use my android wear as alarm clock again without worrying to accidentally mute the phone to no interruptions in my sleep! Thank you so much!
title: Awesome

author: Radomir Pavlik
comment: I have LG Urbane and it works for me even after today's system upgrade. I must say this is amazing app and FREE :) Thank you.

author: Mike Reid
comment: For a single watch on Wear 1.X it's easily a 5* app, if you have multiple watches it gets a little wonky but can still work, though I am sad to report it seems to be incompatible with wear 2.X.

author: Martin Buss
comment: Works well paired with bubble launcher PERFECT
title: Stops my lg g waer watch going crazzy in the shower

author: Damian Driessen
comment: This is THE BEST Android Wear app available. Why is this not in standard Android. We have all begged for it for 2 years. Great job developer. Poor job Google.

author: Syariffudin Sapri
comment: Feature request: maybe you could have a setting like: auto lock when not wear with less battery consumption.
title: Awesome!

author: ivan pena
comment: I have a request is there any way for your phone not to show notifications when locked but still vibrate?
title: Awesome app

author: jeremy stewart
comment: This is a great app, though every time I touch the screen the message "swipe to unlock" pops up and stays until I unlock it. Is there anyway to rid of that message all together? I thought there was a check box for it on the phone part of the app but the message stays on my watch. Thanks!

author: Nate Brown
comment: This is just what I was looking for! This is perfect! The only thing that could make it better would be an option to require the code every X minutes
title: Amazing!!!

author: Jim T
comment: An essential app for anyone who takes showers. Which is everyone, or at least I hope so.
title: Brilliant Wear app

author: Daniel Navarro
comment: I'm extremely grateful for this app. Locks the screen on your Android Wear device, coming in very handy for showering, etc.
title: Must have app

author: Nizzy
comment: Why does it keep locking again when I swipe to see my apps?!?

author: mah Zamani
comment: This app cuses to boging my watch
title: Bog

author: Yash92Duster
comment: Awesome
title: Good works great on Asus zen watch 2 n Galaxy S5 G900h

author: Bikram Datta
comment: Not working after latest android wear update

author: Michael Cain
comment: Duhh!!!
title: Should have been a standard feature

author: Quantrè Rockett
comment: It really needs more background options besides transparent like all black background

author: Edward Cole
comment: I love that :D try it out
title: SO EASY AND SIMPLE!

author: Irmantas Irmantasd
comment: Thank you  very very much

author: Mark King
comment: Love The tiny lock icon.
title: It's great

author: Hoang-Quan TRAN
comment: What's about Wear 2.0?

author: Jasper Yeung
comment: The first lock on Android wear!
title: Goooooood!

author: Maro-Mohamed Elkastawy
comment: Does the job right.
title: Nice performance

author: Syed Kazim Ali Shah
comment: I love this app
title: Very best app

author: Shubham Jaiswal
comment: well done
title: nice
